sbcol.subsec: If you want to see what I actually am doing, the best place to look is in THE SHED. This isn't everything that I am working on, but it is where the greater part of the real action is going on. This is work in progress, expect it to be indiscipherable and misguided.

subsec.title: The Rest
subsec.p: I persist in thinking in terms of books, on a large scale. So far this has meant setting out on substantial projects which for one reason or another (or for no reason at all) don't happen. Meanwhile I have smaller projects, some of which do progress. The formal ones may be found in ``the shed'', but some of my interests demand prose, my attempts at which are more diversely located.

I now think in terms of sewing all these small projects, which do all form a part of a whole in my head, into `books'. The formal parts I now conceive of as combining to form a three volume tome, Analyses of Analysis of which the first volume is what I call 'exegetical analysis', and the second 'synthetic analysis', which I think of as a contemporary approach to doing philosophy in broadly the manner in which Carnap would have wished to see it done (i.e. formally). A third volume is devoted to theory listing, concise presentations of the formal theories developed in the preceding two volumes.
My conception of the informal material is less well developed, though of course it is important not least on the grounds that someone might possibly read it!
